questions.question: 1. How are you feeling today?
questions.description: We'd love to know where you're at emotionally so we can better connect with you through art
options: Something else (please share if you’d like)

questions.question: 2. Is there something specific that has been on your mind recently?
questions.description: This can help us suggest art that might resonate with your current experience
options: The world around us (news, environment, etc.)

questions.question: 3. When you’re feeling stressed or anxious, what usually helps you feel better?
questions.description: This will guide us in finding artwork that comforts or inspires you
options: Listening to music or watching films
Taking a break outdoors or spending time with loved ones

questions.question: 4. Are there specific themes in art that resonate with you during different moods?
questions.description: For example: nature, abstract, human connection, etc.
options: Yes, I connect with certain themes (please list)
Not really, I’m open to exploring different themes

questions.question: 5. How do you prefer to spend your free time?
questions.description: This helps us understand your interests to recommend artworks you might enjoy
options: Alone time for hobbies or self-care
Exploring new ideas or creative projects

questions.question: 6. What’s something you’re passionate about right now?
questions.description: It could be a personal goal, a cause, or something simple that makes you happy

questions.question: 7. How would you describe your ideal social media experience?
8. Are you currently exploring any personal growth or wellness practices?
questions.description: This helps us understand what kind of emotional support or inspiration you might need
options: Yes, I’m focusing on self-care or mindfulness
Not actively, but I’d like to

questions.question: 9. What role does art play in your life?
questions.description: This will help us provide art that aligns with your engagement level
options: It’s a big part of my life; I regularly seek out or create art
I enjoy it occasionally but don’t actively seek it out
I’m new to engaging with art

questions.question: 10. Is there anything else you’d like us to know about how you’d like to experience art on Tart?
